person_say: I’ve been really stressed lately, the exam is coming up, and I can’t focus on studying. Is there a quick way to relax?
animal_say: I hear you! Stress can be tough, but there's a wise bear named Bruno who specializes in relaxation techniques. Want to meet him?

person_say: Yes, meeting Bruno sounds lovely! I would love to get some calming mindfulness tips from him.
animal_say: Great choice! Bruno will share some wonderful mindfulness tips to help you relax and focus. Let's go see him!
